subject: Move sample images to Media tab, fix reader view mobile layout
body:
- Moved SampleImagesSection from TemplatesTab to MediaTab (auto-expands when empty)
- Reader mode now uses 100dvh with flexbox for full viewport coverage
- Compact reader header on mobile (icon-only back button, smaller padding)
- Reactive windowHeight state for proper scale recalculation on resize
- Tighter margins and reduced overhead in reader previewScale calculation
